cybersecurity.title: Comprehensive Cyber Security
cybersecurity.description: Our goal is to provide comprehensive solutions and protection in cyberspace.

aboutcsirt.title: What is
aboutcsirt.description: CSIRT (Computer Security Incident Response Team) is a team of security IT staff that coordinates responses to security incidents, provides support to faculty network administrators and educates the public about cyber security.

description.left: CSIRT (Computer Security Incident Response Team) is responsible for detection, evaluation and resolution of cyber threats in the network of the Faculty of Informatics and Electrical Engineering STU.
description.right: Our team was founded at the faculty on March 17, 2023, and Ing. Štefan Balogh, PhD., who researches detection systems and malware detection at the Institute of Applied Informatics.

organization.subtitle: Organizational structure
organization.description: We are part of the Institute of Applied Informatics FEI STU. Our team is made up of UIM students and employees. Our main teams

networkmonitoring.title: Network monitoring
networkmonitoring.description: The team is responsible for monitoring and analyzing activities on the faculty network in order to identify security threats.

analytics.title: en:Dátová analýza a technologický rozvoj
analytics.description: en:Tím je zodpovedný za zber a analýzu bezpečnostných dát s cieľom identifikovať a predvídať potencionálne hrozby. Taktiež má za úlohu rýchlu a efektívnu komunikáciu bezpečnostných hrozieb a incidentov v rámci fakulty.

education.title: en:Vzdelávanie
education.description: en:Tím je zodpovedná za vytváranie študijných materiálov, kurzov, virtuálnych prostredí na tréning a testovanie rôznych scenárov bezpečnostných incidentov.

development.title: en:Vývoj aplikácií
development.description: en:Tím je zodpovedný za vývoj správu, údržbu a rozvoj infraštruktúry, nástrojov a aplikácií potrebných pre CSIRT FEI.
